testcase.classname: Context Menu on The Internet Website
testcase.name: User right-clicks on the box and sees an alert
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the context menu page.........................................passed When I right-click on the box...............................................passed Then I should see an alert with the message "You selected a context menu"...passed And I should be able to accept the alert....................................passed

testcase.name: Search for a term
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Google search page........................................passed When I search for "GitHub"..................................................passed Then I should see "GitHub" in the results...................................passed
